Twice I have downloaded this, and twice ESET NOD32 has quarantined the file because of a trojan embedded in the avi file :(

Symantec Endpoint Protection v11 found a Bloodhound.Exploit virus IN the .avi movie file. This is NOT a false positive! Waste of a good download! 

Who puts a virus in a kid's movie?

Its just people trolling the torrent. its virus free. They're just talking shit. 

The movie isn't in english however.. so don't bother downloading.

Been doing this for a long time, and this is the first movie I've downloaded with no sound. No sound before conversion and after conversion (obviously LOL).

Thanks anyway uploader.
